title: Ticket #5592: Application-level vanilla universe checkpointing needs attr, reqs.
description: In a mixed-version pool, a job trying to use the experimental support for application-level vanilla universe checkpointing might run on a version which doesn't have that support and not really run at all as it was intended. We need to add a startd attribute (HasALCVU?) and an automatically-inserted requirement for it, if condor_submit detects any of the ALCVU-specific attributes.
creator: tlmiller
